en_text: Whichever path they choose,\nthey are unable to find happiness.
jp_text: どちらに進んでも幸福を 見つけることができない
google_translated: I can not find happiness anyway

en_text: But are there really only\ntwo paths to a forked road?
jp_text: だが 分かれた道は 本当に２つしかないのか
google_translated: But the way I was divided is only two things

en_text: No. There are infinite\npaths we should take.
jp_text: 違う 進むべき道は 無数にあるはずだ
google_translated: There should be countless way to go to different ways

en_text: There is more than one\npath we should take.
jp_text: 俺たちの選ぶべき道は 一つじゃない
google_translated: It is not one of the ways to choose

en_text: There is more than\none path to the future.
jp_text: 未来への未知は 決して１つじゃない
google_translated: Unknown to the future is never one
